name: Hazardous Waste Europe
goal: HWE represents more than 150 hazardous waste treatment installations in Europe operating a wide variety of processes with a total capacity of 4,6 million tons per year. HWE aims at promoting high quality treatments of hazardous waste, environment and human health protection and safety of workers in the legislation.
euInitiatives:
Waste framework directive
Circular economy package
Waste shipment regulation
IED
Waste treatment BREF/ Waste incineration BREF
List of waste
Interface
